p: Interferon (IFN)α, IFNγ, IL-1β, IL-12p40, IL-12p70, Interferon gamma inducible protein (IP)-10, Monocyte chemoattractant protein (MCP)-1, Macrophage inflammatory protein (MIP)-1α// Chemokine (C-C motif) ligand (CCL)3, CCL4 (MIP-1β), IL-4, IL-5, IL-6, IL-7, IL-8, IL-10 and IL-17A from the baseline, 6 month follow-up and repeat episodes of syphilis were measured in a single experiment using a magnetic bead Luminex multiplex assay (EMD Millipore, Billerica, MA, United States (US)) according to the manufacturer’s instructions. Samples below the limit of quantification were assigned the value of half the lowest limit detected for each cytokine (for further study details including quality assessment data please see [ 4]). Macro Vue RPR card test (Becton, Dickinson and Company, Sparks, MD, US) and Treponema pallidum agglutination chemiluminescent immunoassay (Ortho-Clinical Diagnostics, Rochester, NY, US) performed on the Vitros 5600 Integrated System (Ortho-Clinical Diagnostics) were performed at each study visit.
